name: Solarized Dark Modified Colors
description: Combined "Solarized Dark everywhere" and "Global Dark Style". Used xterm-friendly solarized colors. The aim is to change every element into bright foreground on dark background while maintaining the visibility.
additional_info:
Jul, 2016

Made tab and navigation bar backgrounds dark
Modified url dropdown list
Invisible 'close tab' button because left+right click is an alternative

Feb, 2015

Kept the button-background intact, removed some unwanted lines, fixed some viewable contents.


Todo

New tab button background still bright

discussions.name: My eyes no longer melt out of their sockets
